data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Your calculations of our monthly expenses don't add up. Two ____ dollars ____ been ____ to ____ energy ____, ____ the ____ was ____ $158. Where ____ this ____ come ____? I hate to lecture you, but you know that our budget is tight, and continued carelessness could leave us broke.
data.partBlankContent: Your calculations of our monthly expenses don't add up. Two hun____ dollars ha__ been allo_____ to o__ energy bi__, b__ the to___ was on__ $158. Where do__ this discr______ come fr__? I hate to lecture you, but you know that our budget is tight, and continued carelessness could leave us broke.
data.answer: 你对我们每月开支的计算不合理。一个能源账单已经分配了200美元，但总共只有158美元。这种差异从何而来?我不想教训你，但是你知道我们的预算很紧张，继续粗心大意会让我们破产的。
